From: "dcoburn" <dcoburn@...>

::Hakibuscon::

    Hakibuscon watched as the Predacons ran away.  He had to get out of here
as well.  He stood up, and then headed for the exit.  He was limping, and
then he fell down again.  He struggled to get back up, but he did, and
limped his way out of the engine room.  He stopped, and then spat out
mech-fluid.  He looked at his chest, it was all dented, and there was some
mech-fluid pouring out.  His back was also injured.  He could tell that this
was his day.  He awaited the matrix.  The matrix.  No.  There was no matrix
to go to.  He was right, he simply didn't belong.  He fell foward, face
first, and then started crawling.  He transformed into vehicle mode and sped
off, later he transformed back, and opened the hatch.  He made it!!!!!  And
he was still alive!  Well, at least he made it alive out of the Ark.  But,
outside the Ark, would be a whole different story.  He prayed for a miracle
to happen, as he started limping away from the battle, holding his right
shoulder.
